title: SteamPunk1 SoundEffect
longDescription:
🎧️YoutubePreview


📖Overview.

The "SteamPunk1 SoundEffects" Pack is a comprehensive collection of audio effects designed for use in game, film, and animation projects, particularly those with a SteamPunk theme. This pack includes a wide variety of sound effects suitable for creating the ambiance of machinery, gears, motors, gadgets, gizmos, steam engines, and mechanical contraptions. The sound effects are organized into categories such as BikeWheel, Clicks, GasGrill, GasHobMetal, Mech, MetalClanks, Microwave, OldButtons, OvenSlam, Pincers, Pings, PlasticGear, Resonate, Ring, Seatbelt, and more. Each sound effect is available in both stereo and mono formats, allowing for versatile use, whether for UI sound effects or game-specific positional audio.




🕹️Functionality.


  • Diverse Sound Effects: This pack offers a wide range of sound effects suitable for immersing the audience in a SteamPunk-themed environment with authentic mechanical and industrial sounds.
  • Stereo and Mono Files: The sound effects are provided in both stereo and mono formats, offering flexibility for use as UI sound effects or game-specific positional audio.
  • Versatile Use: These sound effects are suitable for a variety of projects, including games, films, animations, and more, to enhance SteamPunk-themed scenes.

⭐5STAR Review.

  • If you like the product, please leave a 5-star review! We always have a great communication with our customers. :D
  • Even if you don't have the sound you want, please leave a 5-star review and feedback! We will check the customer's review every two weeks and fill in the sound as possible every two weeks! We will also give you a relevant reply if your opinion is reflected :D


♬CopyrightFreeMusic Playlist

We provide copyright-free music (CC0) content that can be used in various fields such as games, movies, animations, YouTube, etc., to ensure the success of your projects. Please check out our YouTube channel playlist through the link below! All the music tracks have been composed and produced by us directly. Therefore, we can guarantee that they are very safe from copyright issues.


  • Youtube Playlist
  • Reselling and using for AI training purposes are explicitly prohibited. It must be used as part of personal and corporate projects only.
technicalDetails:
TECHNICAL INFORMATION.

  • Number of Audio Wavs: 225
  • Number of Audio Cues: 225
  • Sample rate : 44.1kHz (Standard)
  • Bit Rate : 320Kbps (Standard)
  • Bit Depth : 24bit Depth (Standard)
  • Do Sound FX loop: No
  • Minutes of audio provided: 11:32
  • Supported Development Platforms: All
  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes


LOUDNESS.

  • Average Short Term : -10LUFS ~
  • Average Long Trem : -12LUFS ~
  • Average Range : 12LU ~
  • Average Momentary : -8LUFS ~
  • Average Trim : 3.0~
  • TruePeak : 0dBTP
  • The loudness values (Short Term, Long Term, Range, Momentary, TruePeak, etc.) may vary depending on the theme, timbre, and character of sound effects.


SOUND EFFECT CREATION METHODS.

How to Create: This product has been produced in a professional studio.

Mixing & Mastering : Yes, This product has been mastered in a professional studio.
